about_the_game:
Pneumatic Panic is a physics-based chaotic co-op road trip game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow companions must arrive at the campgrounds with your supplies, avoiding obstacles along the way.

Coordinate your efforts by completing contextual events. Avoid logs and wildlife, forage for fruit, close doors to prevent the loss of luggage, and pump up deflated tires.



Player task allocation is based on the number of players. In this way, a 3-player experience varies significantly from that of a 4-player experience.
For repeatable group interaction with variety:
  • Players take turns directing the vehicle
  • Contextual pickups & hazards
  • 2, 3 or 4-player Co-Op
  • Group Challenges


Camping supplies are on the roof rack and in the car. Depending on a number of factors, they can slide and fall off/out:
- Speed
- Elevation
- Running over obstacles
- Hitting Wildlife
- Low tire pressure (lopsided)
- Angle

Try to get to the campground with as much of your equipment as you can!
detailed_description:
Pneumatic Panic is a physics-based chaotic co-op road trip game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow companions must arrive at the campgrounds with your supplies, avoiding obstacles along the way.

Coordinate your efforts by completing contextual events. Avoid logs and wildlife, forage for fruit, close doors to prevent the loss of luggage, and pump up deflated tires.



Player task allocation is based on the number of players. In this way, a 3-player experience varies significantly from that of a 4-player experience.
For repeatable group interaction with variety:
  • Players take turns directing the vehicle
  • Contextual pickups & hazards
  • 2, 3 or 4-player Co-Op
  • Group Challenges


Camping supplies are on the roof rack and in the car. Depending on a number of factors, they can slide and fall off/out:
- Speed
- Elevation
- Running over obstacles
- Hitting Wildlife
- Low tire pressure (lopsided)
- Angle

Try to get to the campground with as much of your equipment as you can!

name: Pneumatic Panic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p @ 30 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K | AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450 1GB | Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 60 FPS

short_description: Pneumatic Panic is a physics-based chaotic co-op road trip game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow companions must arrive at the campgrounds with your supplies, avoiding obstacles along the way.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
